full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Project Title: Crab Winch Refurbishment Project for Ontario Waterways – Trent Severn Waterway
#### Solicitation Number: 5P300-22-0061/B
#### Publication Date: October 28, 2022
#### Tender Closing Date: November 16, 2022 2:00 PM (Canada Eastern Time)
#### Amendment Date: November 15, 2022

### Project Description

Parks Canada invites qualified contractors to submit bids for the refurbishment of five (5) sets of crab winches, comprising a total of ten (10) winches to be refurbished. The project falls under the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and is open to bidders worldwide.

### Requirements

* The contract requires the refurbishment of crab winches to meet National Parks Regulations.
* Work must be performed in accordance with the National Park Act.
* The period of the contract is from the contract date to March 31, 2024, inclusive.

### Submission Guidelines

* Bids must be submitted via email to soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca.
* The maximum email file size is 15 megabytes.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring the successful transmission and receipt of their bids.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

### Enquiries

* All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority no later than five (5) calendar days before the bid closing date.
* Enquiries should be marked as technical, proprietary, or general to facilitate response.

### Supporting Documents

* Bid documents can be accessed via the Government of Canada tendering service at [www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders](http://www.buyandsell.gc.ca/tenders).
* Addenda, when issued, will be available on the same platform.

### Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Parks Canada
* Address: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 0B3, Canada
* Email: julie.dicaire@pc.gc.ca
* Phone: 873-355-3506

### Trade Agreements

This project is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and is open to bidders worldwide.

### Region of Delivery

The region of delivery is Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region (NCR).

### GSNIBS and UNSPSC Codes

The following Goods and Services Identification Number (GSNIB) and United Nations Standard Products
